topics.body:
So a bit of good news. No more crickets in my apartmen recently.
Buuuuuuuuuut.
[spoiler]I did find a female Black Widow in my outside trashcan. So if I'm feeling better tomorrow I'll have to relocate her.[/spoiler]

I keep finding scorpions in my house, too. Little ones.
